name: Magical Spell Masters
description:
‘Magical Spell Masters’ is a side-on, 3D, Turn Based, Puzzle Adventure game about spelling words to cast spells. Use your entire vocabulary combined with careful strategy to create a range of dastardly elemental attacks and defeat your foes.

Controls
  • Left Click - Select Rune
  • Backspace - Undo Last Letter
  • Enter - Cast Word
  • Esc - Exit Game
Information

Magical Spell Masters is a student project that we have just begun developing. The intent of this first build is to validate the current controls of the game to see whether or not it is fun and satisfying to spell a word. 

The game is currently in pre-alpha so once you have finished playing, we would appreciate it if you could fill out this really short feedback form. Alternatively you can also contact us directly by email at: magicalspellmasters@gmail.com

If you want to keep up to date with the development of this game, please leave a follow so you can find out when we post our latest build.

Credits

Designers: Finn Mahoney, Sean Brady

Artists: Brandon Nunez, Jamie Appleby, Sean Spek

Programmers: Tim Dodds, Fred Bancan
